text:
ION 6: CHLORHEXIDINE APPLICATION TO UMBILICAL CORD VERSUS DRY CORD CARE
Population: Neonates 
Intervention (exposed in observational studies):  Single or multiple application of chlorhexidine to umbilical cord stump 
Control (unexposed in observational studies): Dry cord care
